short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate distractions by hiding the message list. You can still search for a particluar conversation and chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to send your mom a message but dreaded all the other messages waiting for you?
Want to check if you received a reply to a particular conversation without getting distracted?

Then use Messenger focus-mode to hide your list of messages and unhide them only when you are ready to process them.
